actions.text: Reported to Senate from the Committee on Foreign Relations (without written report).

official_title: A Resolution expressing the sense of the Senate with respect to the situation i n Lebanon.

summary.text: Commends the Administration for its initiative in urging the United Nations Security Council to bring about a ceasefire in Lebanon. Urges all Lebanese factions to support reconciliation efforts and to exercise full restraint in the use of arms. Expresses the sense of the Senate that the United Nations should consider the placing of a peacekeeping force in Lebanon.

titles.title: A Resolution expressing the sense of the Senate with respect to the situation i n Lebanon.
